title: Standard Naval Letter
description: The standard format for correspondence within the Department of the Navy.

title: Business Letter
description: Correspondence with non-DoD entities, agencies, or individuals.

title: New-Page Endorsement
description: Used to forward a basic letter with comments, recommendations, or new information.

title: Memorandum for the Record
description: Internal document used to record events, decisions, or conversations.

title: NAVMC 10274 (AA Form)
description: Administrative Action Form used for personnel requests.

title: Position/Decision Paper
description: Used to advocate for a specific position or decision.

title: Information Paper
description: Provides factual information in concise terms.

title: From-To Memorandum
description: Informal internal correspondence.

title: Letterhead Memorandum
description: Formal memorandum on command letterhead.

title: Memorandum of Agreement
description: Agreement between parties (Conditional).

title: Memorandum of Understanding
description: General understanding between parties (Non-binding).

title: Marine Corps Order
description: Permanent directive establishing policy.

title: Marine Corps Bulletin
description: Directive of duration less than 12 months.

title: Page 11 - Promotion Not Recommended
description: Standard entry for when a Marine is eligible but not recommended for promotion.

title: Page 11 - Promotion Recommended
description: Standard entry for when a Marine is recommended for promotion.

title: Page 11 - 6105 Warning (Not Processing)
description: Standard 6105 counseling entry for deficiencies (not currently being processed).

title: Page 11 - 6105 Processing Entry
description: 6105 counseling entry when already being processed for judicial or adverse admin action.

title: Page 11 - Illegal Drug Involvement
description: Mandatory entry for illegal drug use per MCO 5300.17A / MCO 1900.16 CH 2.

title: Page 11 - Alcohol Abuse
description: Entry for alcohol-related incident per MCO 5300.17A.

title: Page 11 - BCP Assignment
description: Assignment to Body Composition Program per MCO 6110.3A.

title: Page 11 - Voluntary Retirement (Officer)
description: Officer retirement request per MCO 1900.16 CH 2.

title: Page 11 - Resignation (Officer)
description: Officer resignation request per MCO 1900.16 CH 2 para 5003.

title: Page 11 - VSI/SSB Separation
description: Voluntary Separation Incentive or Special Separation Benefit acknowledgment.

title: Page 11 - Hostile Fire Area Waiver (OCD)
description: Overseas Control Date waiver for hostile fire assignment per MCO 1300.8 W/CH 1.

title: Page 11 - Sole Surviving Son/Daughter Waiver
description: Waiver of restrictive assignment rights per MCO 1300.8 W/CH 1.

title: Page 11 - PRP Preliminary Screening
description: Personnel Reliability Program preliminary screening per SECNAVINST 5510.35D.

title: Page 11 - PRP Permanent Decertification
description: Personnel Reliability Program permanent decertification per SECNAVINST 5510.35D.
